name: As Prescribed
description:
"As Prescribed" is a text-based sandbox game in which you discover ways to die by combining various illnesses, drugs, and meals. Nothing in the game makes sense; nothing happens for a reason, and players frequently might find themselves uncomfortable. But this is to be expected when you're dying. 

Multiple playthroughs suggested to get the full experience!

Made for Jame Gam #25, with a theme of "Unintentional Side Effects" and a special object of "Butter Chicken."
